section.title: Building DevCloud
section.para: The DevCloud appliance can be downloaded from the wiki at . It can also be built from scratch. Code is being developed to provide this alternative build. It is based on veewee, Vagrant and Puppet.
The goal is to automate the DevCloud build and make this automation capability available to all within the source release of &PRODUCT;

warning.para: This is under heavy development. The code is located in the source tree under tools/devcloud
A preliminary wiki page describes the build at https://cwiki.pache.org/CLOUDSTACK/building-devcloud.html
